product_summary: Corgea is a security tool that helps teams issue fixes for vulnerable code using AI for engineers to review. It integrates with existing SAST & SCA tools to generate fixes, which can be sent to engineers with a single click. Corgea claims to reduce the effort spent fixing issues by 80%, freeing up engineers to focus on revenue-generating tasks.
product_pros: Frees up engineering resources by reducing the time spent fixing vulnerabilities.
Easy to use, with no additional logins or commands required for engineers.
Provides peace of mind by ensuring that vulnerabilities are fixed quickly and efficiently.
product_cons: May not be suitable for all organizations, especially those with limited security resources.
Reliance on AI could lead to false positives or missed vulnerabilities.
Pricing information is not readily available.
May require additional training or support for engineers to fully utilize the tool.
May not be able to handle complex or custom codebases effectively.

product_usecases.details: Corgea can be used to identify and fix vulnerabilities in software code, reducing the risk of security breaches and data loss.
Corgea can be used to analyze code for potential vulnerabilities and security issues, helping developers to write more secure code.
Corgea can be integrated into DevOps pipelines to automate the process of identifying and fixing vulnerabilities, improving the efficiency and security of software development.
Corgea can be used by software developers to quickly and easily fix vulnerabilities in their code, reducing the time and effort required to maintain secure software.
Corgea can be used to perform security audits of software code, helping organizations to identify and fix vulnerabilities before they can be exploited.

product_toolfor.details: Corgea can help security teams to identify and fix vulnerabilities in software code, reducing the risk of security breaches and data loss.
Corgea can help development teams to write more secure code by identifying and fixing vulnerabilities, reducing the time and effort required to maintain secure software.
Corgea can help DevOps teams to automate the process of identifying and fixing vulnerabilities, improving the efficiency and security of software development.
Corgea can help software auditors to identify and fix vulnerabilities in software code, helping organizations to meet compliance requirements and reduce the risk of security breaches.
Corgea can be used by organizations of all sizes to improve the security of their software development process and reduce the risk of security breaches.

product_pricing: Pricing information is not readily available on the website.
